cc.mallet.grmm.inference.gbp

Class FullMessageStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • cc.mallet.grmm.inference.gbp.AbstractMessageStrategy
      • cc.mallet.grmm.inference.gbp.FullMessageStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageStrategy

    public class FullMessageStrategy
extends AbstractMessageStrategy
    A first implementation of MessageStrategy that assumes that a BP region graph is being used. Created: May 29, 2005
    Version:
    $Id: FullMessageStrategy.java,v 1.1 2007/10/22 21:37:58 mccallum Exp $
